wikipedia_page.main:
Luke Richard Chapman (born 21 March 1991) is an English former footballer who played as a midfielder.
He left Port Vale in October 2009 after making one appearance for the club. Following this he spent a brief time with Hednesford Town, before joining Rocester in 2010. He signed with Stafford Rangers in summer 2011, before joining Sutton Coldfield Town in October 2011.
